basics.summary: PhD Student in Information Science at Cornell Tech, focusing on transparent AI and autonomous vehicle interaction with a strong interest in designing interactions with positive societal impact.

work.name: Cornell Tech University
work.summary: Working under the advisement of assistant professor Qian Yang and co-advised by associate professor Wendy Ju, focusing on transparent AI & autonomous vehicle interaction.

work.name: Volkswagen Group Future Center
work.summary: Led the design of inclusive user experiences for fully autonomous vehicles and developed next-generation driver interfaces. Involved in the creation and transformation of CARIAD.

work.name: Robert Bosch
work.summary: Designed V2X interfaces and researched interfaces for autonomous vehicles tailored for older adults and disabled users.
